description: This file defines a React context provider component 'CartProvider' that manages shopping cart state, including items, totals, and persistence to storage. It includes functions to add, remove, update items, and computes cart totals.

methods.name: CartProvider({ children })
methods.description: A React component that provides cart state and actions to its children via context.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a product to the cart with a specified quantity, or updates quantity if already present.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.description: Removes an item from the cart by its ID.

methods.name: updateQuantity
methods.description: Updates the quantity of a specific cart item, ensuring minimum of 1.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.
